sentence: However, candidates Doug Mastriano and Dave White vowed to make no such exceptions.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: Leading GOP candidate for Pennsylvania governor opposes health exceptions for abortion

sentence: Republicans across Pennsylvania are questioning former President Trumps last-minute endorsement of State Sen. Doug Mastriano (R) in the gubernatorial race.
author: John Binder
title: Republicans Very Disappointed in Trumps Mastriano Endorsement, Continue Lining Up Behind Lou Barletta

sentence: I really hope that Dave White and Bill McSwain would see that as well that Im the one person, Ive been at the top of every poll with Doug Mastriano since the day I announced.? And they have spent over $20-something million on their campaigns and havent gotten above me once,? he continued.
author: John Binder
title: Exclusive: Pennsylvanias Lou Barletta Calls on Fellow GOP Candidates to Drop Out, Endorse Him in Gubernatorial Race
